description: G1 rear garden - 3x stems of Lilac (Syringae vulgaris), 1x Elder (Sambucus sp.) and 1x Camelia, Approx Height - 2-4m - Fell and grind out stumps to a minimum of 250mm below the stumps current ground level and leave all stump's arising to allow for ground settlement to give clearance to garden and allow reasonable use, ease future maintenance, allow replanting and give clearance to access path.T1 on  Right hand boundary of rear garden - Pear (Pyrus communis), Approx Height - 5m, Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 3mReduce crown all round by upto 0.5m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions, as part of regular maintenance, to keep at a manageable size for the spaceT2 Rear boundary (flat B garden) - Cypress (Cupressus sp.) Approx Height - 14m, Approx Spread - 8m, Section dismantle tree to ground level. Cut stump as close to tree's current ground level as possible and leave the stump in the ground as Tree is dead standingT3 Rear garden, adjacent to flat C garden - Cherry (Prunus avium), Approx Height - 7-8m, Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 8m - reduce crown all round by upto 1.5m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions to form a more compact, manageable crown
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
